item.title: I’m still trying to figure out how this MacBook Air was only $240
item.description: Save 75% on a refurbished 2017 MacBook Air featuring an Intel Core i5, 8GB RAM, and 128GB SSD. It’s perfect for home use and everyday tasks.

item.title: Get a $40 learn-to-code package and master the tech of tomorrow, from Python to AI
item.description: This learn to code certification bundle covers Python, AI, JavaScript, and more to equip you with the skills to tackle today’s coding challenges — on sale now for just $39.97.

item.title: You don't want to miss this price on Windows 11 Pro — just $17.97
item.description: Upgrade to Windows 11 Pro for just $17.97 (reg. $199) through October 6.

item.title: Get lifetime access to all of Babbel’s languages for just $150
item.description: Get lifetime access to all 14 Babbel languages for just $149.97 (reg. $599) through October 6.

item.title: Get the “oops-proof” drone for beginners who want killer 4K footage — now 45% off
item.description: This drone with dual 4K cameras and obstacle avoidance is perfect for capturing amazing footage without the crashes. Get it on sale now for just $64.97.

item.title: The best laptops under $500: They may be even cheaper during October Prime Day
item.description: After extensive hands-on testing, these are the best laptops we've found for under $500. Learn about our favorite gaming machines, Chromebooks, and budget picks, and maybe even score a better bargain during Prime Big Deal Days.

item.title: The best laptops we've tested and reviewed: Look for these 8 models during October Prime Day
